content.description: Figure 1 represents a common process that occurs in organisms.
content.question: Figure 1. Structural formula for a common biological reaction Which of the following is an accurate description of the process shown in Figure 1 ?

choices.label: The linking of amino acids with an ionic bond as an initial step in the protein synthesis process
The formation of a more complex carbohydrate with the covalent bonding of two simple sugars
The hydrolysis of amino acids with the breaking of covalent bonds with the release of water
The formation of a covalent peptide bond in a dehydration synthesis reaction

content.answer: The formation of a covalent peptide bond in a dehydration synthesis reaction
